headline: Why Is Honeywell International Inc. (HON) Among the Best Conglomerate Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Conglomerate Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) stands against the other conglomerate stocks. As per Lloyd Capital, the new year starts on the back of economic resilience. Global conditions remain benign, […]
